title: International Bibliography of Social and Cultural Anthropology
aka: Bibliographie Internationale d'Anthropologie Sociale et Culturelle
additional-notes: This is a French publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Some issues or subseries of this serial have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that an issue from this series is in the public domain, search for renewals under its distinctive title, and under its subseries title if applicable. We have not systematically searched individual issue or subseries titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
